title: Wait, They Said What?!
content: Photo by Chris Amelung, via Flickr (https://www.flickr.com/photos/amelungc/) What happens when you put a microphone on a pole in the Mission of San Francisco, what does it pick up? Jessamyn made a post about just such a thing, the bop spotter, which isn't about surveillance per se, but what's poppin' off in real-time on the street, check it out!
author: Brandon Blatcher
